title: Holly Golightly - 6 Albums
description:
6 Holly Lightly Albums.  i find this collection of albums to be a relatively fair sampling of Ms. Golightly's body of work.  as far as i know, there are 83 individual tracks (i.e., no repeat tracks from other albums, at least insofar as the 6 i have presented here are concerned).

all files in .m4a (AAC) format (from my itunes.  if you don't like itunes (m4a/AAC), fucking convert the files--it's free, ya cheap bastard, and it takes all of what?  seconds?  to convert songs--or you can find and download the mp3s somewhere else).  

i realize most of (if not all of) this is available elsewhere.  i tried to make it easy for people who don't want to spend hours fucking around looking for and downloading numerous torrents.

if you've never heard Ms. Golightly, think Nancy Sinatra in the modern day, having managed to avoid becoming a pop nightmare.
